lines.text: The guy's wearing a damn skirt!
Scotland? Scotland's shit. Kick his Scotland ass. Pull off his damn skirt, I'd like to see if he's got any drawers on.
Sometimes life is... is... ugly. And stupid. And mean.
The whole bet is on Atilla!
Don't ever lose your heart Lionheart, 'cause you'll never get it back.
He was not enough strong to be jail!
You know why we're here. Don't force us to get rough in front of little girl.
Without me, they'll be on the street!
Tell your sad stories to the court martial. We're just supposed to take you back... any way we can.
Just give me one week to get the money for them. One week.
Your time was up in the desert, and we still owe you for that one. Fucker!
